providers.description: Provides home-delivered meals to eligible residents of Orange County who are unable to shop or cook independently.
providers.eligibility: Homebound residents of Orange County, including seniors and adults with disabilities.
providers.name: Orange County Meals on Wheels

providers.description: Local child care subsidy administration supporting employment and education.
providers.eligibility: Residents of Orange County who meet Virginia program requirements.
providers.name: Orange County Department of Social Services - Child Care Subsidy

providers.description: Low-cost preventive dental care provided by dental hygiene students under the supervision of licensed dental professionals.
providers.eligibility: Open to the public; suitable for individuals seeking affordable preventive dental services
providers.hours: Varies by academic semester; appointments required
providers.name: Germanna Community College Dental Hygiene Clinic
